titleStmt.title: To the most excellent princesse the Dutchesse of Newcastle.
titleStmt.author: H. J. of Grays-Inne.

notesStmt.note: Signed: By H.J. of Grays-Inne, gent. With allowance, Apr. 27. R. L'Estrange.
Verse: "My muse beggs pardon of your Grace, that she ..."
